net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeItem, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.world.item.Item>, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.IInformationProvider
public class ItemMaceOfDestruction extends ItemMace
A mace that produces explosions around the player, without damaging that player.
